Episodes.Title: Save the Turtle!
Episodes.Plot: When Tuck dreams of being somewhere other than the classroom, he ends up stuck on a coral reef. Ming-Ming and Linny must venture to the Caribbean to save him. It's a relaxing, sunny place, but they do their best to keep their minds on the job.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Save Little Red Riding Hood!
Episodes.Plot: The Wonder Pets once again travel to the puppet theater, this time to save Little Red Riding Hood. The Big Bad Wolf is chasing her, but she doesn't believe she's in any danger. The wolf acts as if he's friendly to trick her, while secretly plotting to eat both her and her grandmother.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Save the Egg!
Episodes.Plot: The Wonder Pets receive a call for rescue from an egg and travel to Yellowstone Park. There, they face obstacles such as a mischievous prairie dog and a gushing geyser. As they cope with the unique difficulties of trying to save an egg, they also wonder the whole time just what type of animal the egg contains.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Save the Flamingo!
Episodes.Plot:
When a baby flamingo is trapped in a muddy pit, the Wonder Pets most fly into a 
colorig book to save him. This colorful world provides an exciting adventure for the Wonder Pets, who face the challenge of rescuing the flamingo without being trapped themselves.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Save the Bee!
Episodes.Plot: The Wonder Pets must shrink to the size of bees to help one who is having trouble making nectar. When she has problems with flying, they try to help her learn. Everyone discovers the value of practice.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Save the Squirrel!
Episodes.Plot: The Wonder Pets receive a call from a squirrel who is trapped on a ferris wheel at Coney Island. When they free the squirrel from the wheel, they discover that it seems to be lost, but is reluctant to ask for help. They enjoy the delights of Coney Island as they try to persuade the squirrel.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Save the Chameleon!
Episodes.Plot: The Wonder Pets travel to the island of Madagascar to save a chameleon from a cuckoo hawk. Along the way, they try new ways of doing things and learn about the concept of camouflage.

Episodes.Title: Save the Platypus!
Episodes.Plot: When Ming-Ming pays a visit to Tuck's cage, she messes with his things, causing him to declare he's not speaking to her. Not impressed, Ming-Ming begins a silent treatment of her own. Nevertheless, the two must still work together to help a platypus stuck on a river in Australia.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Save the Dragon!
Episodes.Plot: The Wonder Pets return to the Magical Land seen in Save the Unicorn! to rescue the baby dragon. The dragon is trapped on a cloud that is rapidly shrinking. They have to figure out a way for him to get down without getting hurt.

Episodes.Title: Save the Beaver!
Episodes.Plot: A beaver in Vermont needs help when her dam springs a leak. The Wonder Pets must figure out how to stop it before her home is destroyed.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Save the Goslings!
Episodes.Plot: The Wonder Pets help Canadian Geese to fly south.

Episodes.Title: Ollie to the Rescue!
Episodes.Plot: Ollie, the bunny who once joined the Pets on a rescue, sets up his own animal-rescue service.

Episodes.Title: Save the Ladybug!
Episodes.Plot: A ladybug is trapped in a venus flytrap and it's up to the Wonder Pets to set her free.

Episodes.Title: Save the Sea Turtle!
Episodes.Plot: The Wonder Pets head to Japan to help a lost Sea Turtle that is looking for the sea.

Episodes.Title: Save the Pangaroo!
Episodes.Plot: A drawing of a special Pangaroo, which is part parrot and part kangaroo, is throw in the garbage can and it needs the Wonder Pets to retreive it.

Episodes.Title: Save the Cricket!
Episodes.Plot: The Wonder Pets head to Chicago to help a cricket that becomes trapped in a soap bubble.

Episodes.Title: Save the Armadillo!
Episodes.Plot: The Wonder Pets must save a baby armadillo because he thinks that the old West town that he lives in is haunted.

Episodes.Title: Save the Itsy Bitsy Spider!
Episodes.Plot: The Wonder Pets help a distraught spider that keeps being flushed down the waterspout in a painting.

Episodes.Title: Save the Beetles!
Episodes.Plot: In an 1970's pop Beatles theme, the Wonder Pets must figure out a way to save four beetles that have become trapped in seaweed in their yellow submarine in Liverpool, while they are inside their submarine.

Episodes.Title: Three Wonder Pets and a Baby!
Episodes.Plot: A piglet needs the Wonder Pets' help really close to home...in the schoolhouse.

Episodes.Title: Save the Gecko!
Episodes.Plot: The Wonder Pets are followed home from Costa Rica by a baby Gecko.

Episodes.Title: Save the Griffin!
Episodes.Plot: The Wonder Pets travel to medieval times as knights, to save a griffin who's tail is caught under a rock.
